po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni

snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang

dag par brjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems can stobs dang ldan rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams

cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o/ /'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /

skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs brtse ba

mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spro ba su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu

chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems

dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par

lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub

sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros

dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan dang /

byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa

'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /

byang chub sems dpa' nyi gdugs snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dpa' ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i

dus kyi tshe bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang dag par bshad par spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni bya dka' ba ste/

cho ga 'di 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs

nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM

maM/ b+ha ra te/ b+ha ra te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra na te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems

dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos chos zhes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /chos thams

cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /

yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o/ /de nas yang 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid

dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags

pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji

srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa

srid do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs

kyi bu rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ci srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas

zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyan

thos thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i bstan pa lta ci smos/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba mdzad par de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las

langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ chos smra ba de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad

par rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de

dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams

pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur ba las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par

'gyur/ lce dang sna med par 'gyur/ rka lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/ lus nad bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug

pa de dag gi skyon du gyur pa'o/ /'jam dpal mdor bshad na de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med par 'jug go/ /gal te mir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyur

ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can du 'gyur/ mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi

dgas 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig /'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos par 'gyur te skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar

'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas slan chad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du

gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun du 'bar ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang /

reg dka' ba dang / drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / sbyi'u tshugs dang / spri'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang / rul pa dang / rtag tu dri nga dang / rab 'joms

dang / nges 'joms dang / shin tu gnod 'joms rnams te 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhus pa de legs par zhus so/ /kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas

shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go/ /'chi

ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu'i

chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan dngags sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ mdo

sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes 'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro/ /spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun du 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur

ro/ /skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal ba mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro/ /gal te bskal pa brgya dag

'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs thams cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / ltag sgur dang / mjing pa nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres shing skom

pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam thos na yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma

'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par

gyur pa dang / ji ltar shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig

rten skyong pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dngangs nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu dngangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs

po dag de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so/ /grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin na nga nyid kyang skrag na gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de

ni mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i

'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag dper na dkon mchog za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das 'di ni legs par gsungs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos

smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/ tha na dge 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal gcig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo / /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/ 'on te ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i

bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni bla'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas

nas mir skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan du zhing

'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/ /las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma gyur cig/ //bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam ma sems shig ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems

can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'da'

bar 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa

dang / log par lta ba dag ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par spangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i sems can gcig po ni yongs su

gtang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig

yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/ ngu zhing smre sngags 'don to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu gcig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig

mi gnas so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs

chen po mngon par sprul te/ bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags shing 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin

par mdzad cing 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te/ mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no/ /dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing

spros pa med do/ /'on kyang sems can rnams dang mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs

pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang / phul dang / bla

ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o/ /rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim pa yang rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de

la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'ched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor

mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa

rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /bsti stang bgyi'o/ /bla mar bgyi'o/ /ri mor bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /rjed par bgyi'o/ /gsol bar bgyi'o/ /

bsti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang

bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os dang / phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ /de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i

'os lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / kun tu

bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di legs par smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab (pa

pa ,pa )dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu tshig 'di legs

par smras pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig

ldan pa/ /shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog /yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshigs legs smras/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na dkon mchog ta la la'i

gzungs 'thob bo/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog

med pa dang / rlom sems med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so/ /kun tu bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod

par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs

kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na lha dang / mi'i skye dgu las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to/ /dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan

pa kun dga' ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa

zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos na chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i

dus kyi tshe sems can mang po dag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs

zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/ lce na bar mi 'gyur/ sna na bar mi 'gyur/ so na bar mi 'gyur/

lag pa dang rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/ klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad srung

bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe bdud bar chad mi bgyid

pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs

'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can gyi rang gi khyim kun du 'bar ba mthong ste/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo/ /kun dga' bo sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de

mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol ba/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa

la blta ba'i slad du mchis shing / mchis nas kyang sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di lta bu bkol te/ nga la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa yin mod kyi/ kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin po che dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi'i 'jig rten dang lha'i 'jig rten dang dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa brtsegs pa'i snying po 'od zer bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las mngon du thos te kun dga' bo bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma myong nas ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos

te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung bstan to/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la phyis nga la phyag 'tshol cig /de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu

tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /a la la chos/ a la la chos/ chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /

kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la

kye grogs po dag khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas

byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nyi ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang / ji ltar tshong ba thabs mi shes pa dang / ji ltar mi dbul

po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/ de dag gi don du ngas dpe 'di byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang sems can thams cad kyi don du da khyod la gsol ba 'debs na

rigs kyi bu khyod spro'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems

dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to//

ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'jig

rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag spro lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag spro lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa

mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi thu bo dang /

gtso bo dang / mchog dang dam pa dang phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /dus dus su bsti stang gyis shig /rin po che'i snod du chug la phrag pa la thogs

shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig /rigs kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde

bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyis nyon cig /'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dang 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan thong la/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

kun tu bzang po rab tu byung ba dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun du

spyod pa de dag 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po mi gti mug pa de dag gi don du ngas mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag la yang yongs su

bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsti stang du bgyi'o/ /btsun par bgyi'o/ /rim gror bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /rjed par bgyi'o/ /gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub

sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ /yon tan kun bshad thams cad nga las nyon/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la/ /

dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ma ga d+hA 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung / /rang byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs zhes grag /ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas/ /shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i

zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs gcig /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor/ /sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas/ /mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas/ /'jam dpal gzhon

nu shar gyi phyogs logs nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing bcu rdul snyed lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs/ /de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed

dang lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur/ /der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa/ /'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris/ /sangs

rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci/ /de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ /rnyog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang / /bde yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang / /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi

spyod yul gtsang / /rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyis/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang / /spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /yon tan mtha' yas ldan dang yon tan

las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin du chung / /byang chub gzhir gyur pa yi rang byung sems/ /thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te/ /mtshungs med kyis

kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams/ /bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ /yon tan chu bo zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /

dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste/ /mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang / /sa chen rnams las rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs/ /byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin gyi na ma yin gyi/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang

dge 'dun la/ /dad dang dang ba bskyed nas sems skye ste/ /de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang / /bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems skye'o/ /rtag tu

sems can phan par bya phyir dang / /zhing rnams sbyang dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / /chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang / /ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal ba kun dang chos dang da bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la rtag tu

dad pa dang / /dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas/ /bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la/ /byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyi

sems skye'o/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams/ /bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing / /chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la/ /bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o/ /dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa ste/ /yon

tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed/ /dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin/ /dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed/ /nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog /

lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed/ /dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed/ /

dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing / /nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin/ /dad pa rang 'byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med/ /mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog gcig yin/ /dad pa bdud

kyi lam las 'da' byed cing / /thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/ /yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba/ /dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin/ /dad

pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi/ /de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag tshul khrims

bslab pa yongs mi 'dor/ /gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba/ /yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod/ /tshul khrims byang chub sems ston byed pa ste/ /slob pa'i sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyar/ /tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi

byed pa/ /de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal la mchod pa rgya chen byed/ /gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu chos

la dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal bar chos nyan ngoms pa med/ /gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/ /de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dad gus pa/ /de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin/ /gang dag mi

ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa/ /de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/ /gang dag dbang po rna zhing rab gsal ba/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par

spangs/ /gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa/ /de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung / /gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed/ /gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa/ /

bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur/ /gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs/ /gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis

byin brlabs pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/ /gang dag byang chub don du sems skye ba/ /de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/ /de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skye/ /

gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/ /de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs/ /mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/ /de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag /gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/ /de dag lhag pa'i

bsam pa dam pa mchog /gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod/ /gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs/ /gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa/ /de dag

sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/ /gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi phyed/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /gang dag sangs rgyas

bsam yas rtag mthong ba/ /de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /de dag bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur/ /gang dag bar skabs chos las mi nyams pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa

med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod/ /gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa/ /de

dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa/ /de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can/ /de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor/ /gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bor ba/ /de

dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /gang dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa/ /de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang dag 'khor bar

yongs su mi skyo ba/ /de dag rtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /gang dag rtun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam par dag skyes pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs/ /gang dag

'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed mkhas/ /'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/ /'gro ba sdud shes cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /gang

dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed/ /gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa/ /de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin/ /gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa/ /dpa' bo de dag bla med lam

la gnas/ /dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa/ /de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa/ /de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das/ /gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa/ /

de dag mi ldog sa ni rjes su 'thob/ /gang dag mi ldog sa ni thob gyur pa/ /de dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin/ /gang dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron te rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de

dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas/ /rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ /gang dag rgyal ba

kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser

gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa/ /de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras/ /gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras

pa/ /de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so/ /gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang 'byung / /gang dag 'od las pad+ma

rnams byung ba/ /de dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed/ /gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag

tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston

par byed/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim par byed/ /gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ /de dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can

'dul/ /gang dag so sor rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang / /gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes

sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed/ /gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa/ /de

dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo / /gang dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la

sems kyis rnam par shes/ /gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing / /

nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab tu phye bas 'jig rten rgyu/ /gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu

dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la gnas/ /gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa/ /de dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes su 'thob/ /

gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang

bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa/ /de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to/ /gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba/ /mthu brtan

de dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas/ /mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa/ /mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams

kyis shes par yong mi nus/ /mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa/ /de dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do/ /gang dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /

ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin pa sbyin byed kyi/ /sbyin pa thams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus/ /chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge ba'i las rnams rab tu

spyod 'gyur te/ /dkon mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje mkhregs pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams/ /mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan chu/ /

gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa/ /de ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na chos kyang med gyur pa/ /phyogs der chos kyi gter ni ston par byed/ /de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtog cing / /de dag lhun gyis grub par

phyogs kun du/ /zla ba lta bur snang bar rab ston cing / /thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten kun du byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang / /

ring bsrel rab tu rgyas pa'ang dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa/ /sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed cing / /theg gsum sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /

mos pa kun gyi bsgrub pa shes pa rnams/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med lus rnams dang / /lha mi lha min klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos/ /

dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang / /rtags dang spyod dang sgra skad 'jug pa dag /ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed/ /de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis ma khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod par byed/ /gang dag zhing bkod

bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas so/ /gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel pa'i

ye shes bsam yas pa/ /de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam

'phrul dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / /bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos/ /bsam gtan rnam par

'phrul dang shes rab dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting nge 'dzin/ /rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /rdul gcig steng na zhing rnams

bsam mi khyab/ /ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul de'i steng na sangs rgyas bcas zhing dang / /sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang kha cig ston/ /nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa kha cig dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams

la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang / /la la spyi'u tshugs gyur dang mthun pa dang / /la la snrel zhi smig rgyu lta bu dang / /la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams/ /ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa/ /de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston/ /

drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste/ /skyes bu chen po rnams

la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu dag na me tog phreng ba dang / /spos byug rin chen rin che ji snyed pa/ /de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin/ /gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal mtshan

ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs/ /phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang / /drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil

nas char 'bebs shing / /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod/ /phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi bang dang / /sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs/ /phyogs

bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi/ /yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang / /bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs/ /'od zer gang dag las dges yongs bsags pa/ /lag

pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing / /spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du/ /'bebs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod/ /'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i rgyan phreng bsam yas rab 'phyang ba/ /pad+ma

mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag /lag nas rgyal ba rnams la mchod par byed/ /me tog phal chen me tog bla re dang / /me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag

nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang / /bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen spos dang spos

kyi bla re dang / /spos kyis bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs spos rnams kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phreng ba phal chen phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /

phreng ba sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phye ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag

rgyal ba mchod/ /na bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /na bza' sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re

dang / /gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang / /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /

rin chen sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang / /pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /pad+ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag

rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyan phreng phal chen rgyan phreng bla re dang / /rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye

zhing / /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ /du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan par byed/ /nor bu 'dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/ /dar gyi lda ldi ba dan rab dpyangs shing / /dril g.yer

dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de dag 'dzin/ /lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa mtha' yas rnams/ /rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam

'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing / /bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo/ /thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa

mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang / /bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang / /kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang / /bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang / /

don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang / /spyad pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang / /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang / /bden dang

brten dang rnam par thar sgo dang / /kha cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang / /nyan thos theg pas rnam par grol sgo dang / /rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang / /theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang / /kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug

bsngal sgo/ /kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang / /zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/ /

de dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /gang dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsams bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/ /ting 'dzin rnam

par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o/ /de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa/ /dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsams pa brtan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /gang du lo nyes 'jig

rten yo byad gang / /bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa/ /der ni kun gyis bsams bzhin bya ba yin/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang / /

rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ /brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing / /gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te/ /phreng bas spud cing spos kyis bskus pa yi/ /

gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/ /blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs la mos pa'i sems can

'dul bar byed/ /de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang / /khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang / /rnga dang tshangs dang mi'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/ /rgyal ba gang dag

'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye drag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed/ /bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas

shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing / /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ /gang na mngon

byung med cing chos med de/ /dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs te/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung / /de dag khyim dang 'ching dang srid pa'i gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i

phyir/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang / /drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ /yongs su brjod cing 'gro

ba'i don rnams byed/ /gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /der ni rga bas nyen cing nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/ /'jig rten

gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing / /rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang / /chos kyi khyad par brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid

rjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/ /gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul

pas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin/ /dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/ /de dag snyan dngags

mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /bzhag mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang / /sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun du ston/ /grong ba grong dpon kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ded dpon tshong

dpon khyim bdag 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang / /sman pa 'jig rten bstan bcos cho ga mkhan/ /de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong

po dang / /lam gol dong ba rnams la lam ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos chos tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten rjod par byed/ /

'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang / /sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rigs stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/ /drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba/ /

drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang / /mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /gdung ba gau ta ma dang mi smrar spyod/ /gcer bu

gos med lhur len dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston/ /de dag kun du 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang / /bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang / /ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dge tu yang slob dpon

'gyur ba yin/ /nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs spyod/ /gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum cu pa/ /de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /lha yi shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang / /mu stegs nye reg

yul du rgyu rnams su/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang / /bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog /cog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang / /gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang / /de dag

tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing / /bsnyen dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyis/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs

pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis/ /de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed/ /la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la

gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis/ /la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don la rnam nges rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang / /bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /

la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ /la lar srin po 'byung po sha za dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye che tshig dang / /

mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed/ /de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin

rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// //bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ /de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ /'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /

mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing / /chos kyang yongs bstan de la

ma bstan cing / /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas/ /des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed ces bya rab gtong zhing / /rdul dang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te/ /

'jig rten phan pa'i 'od des rab tu snang / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron bzung bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'bru mar mar me mar gyi

mar me dang / /rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang / /spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag /rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/ /sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag sred

yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go cha gyon/ /gang dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong khyer ston/ /stegs

dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru 'byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags byas pas/ /des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /

'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing / /chos la mos pa'i ro ni don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas/ /bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten skom pa'i sred pa rnam

par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa chu dngo dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ /des na sred pa sel ba grub par gyur/ /dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od

des bskul byas pa/ /dga' ba rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pas/ /

des na dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu

zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te/ /byang

chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/ /des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer zhing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin

par byed/ /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin de byed tshe/ /slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can

gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis khong du chud/ /chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /don la nges pa'i ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas

na/ /des na ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed

med pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing / /rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag /bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi zad bzod kyi

gzungs ni thob gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan gdags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing / /'gro ba chos kyis rjes su bsrung byas pas/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub

par 'gyur/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul ba/ /longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/ /ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can/ /nor

rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar shes nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa spel byas pas/ /des na stong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims rnam par

dag la gnas gyur nas/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud cing / /byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas/ /yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub

bo/ /bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /khro dang tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrugs pa ma

byas shing / /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/ /des na bzod pa bkod pa de grub bo/ /sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /le lo'i sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo

med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/ /byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug

ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs bzung bas/ /des na sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od thob bo/ /zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /de dag chags med

sdang med rmongs med cing / /rtogs par gyur nas mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod can dang / /'dre ba yongs su rnam par spang byas te/ /dgon par rab zhi bsam gtan bsngags brjod pas/ /des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub

bo/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /shes 'chal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud 'gyur/ /bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po

shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing / /nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa/ /chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad

pas/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams/ /pad+ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs par mthong / /

sangs rgyas che dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing / /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas/ /de nas sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jigs nyen

sems can gang dag des reg pa/ /'byung po gza' dang gsad brdeg bcing ba dang / /nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bskyabs dang / /srog chags gsod las bzlog pa byas pa dang / /'jigs pa skyabs

tshol rnams la skyabs byas pas/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa/ /rnam pa kun du nad kyi sdug bsngal thar/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/ /nad gsos

'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom byin pas de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes

dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing 'gro/ /'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su gtang brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i

'od zer de thob bo/ /chos rab rjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'dri bar byed/ /de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams

kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing / /'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes/ /brjod pas chos rab brjod pa'i de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten gsum na sgra rgyud ji

snyed pa/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod de/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don du sil snyan dang / /sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/ /rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub bo/ /'chi med sbyin

pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te/ /yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang / /'gog

pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi skyid ces/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo/ /khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang / /ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos/ /thub

chen rgyal po'i khrims kyis mchog gyur cing / /ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces/ /byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/ /des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od

des bskul byas pa/ /rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/ /skye bo nyon mongs rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ /rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas/ /rin chen

bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /

mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag /byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/ /sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /sil snyan

bsgrags shing spos kyis bdugs pa yis/ /pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/ /sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing / /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /des na sna tshogs bkod pa

grub par gyur/ /shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sa rnams lag 'thil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des na shin tu dang ba'i 'od grub bo/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin

rnams kun tu gnas/ /mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob/ /lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /gcer bu gos yong rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag /sbyin pa byas pas

lhab lhub bkod pa grub/ /ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dbul po

dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ /dkon mchog gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa/ /dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo/ /mig rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i

mchod rten la/ /mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /sna rnam sbyong ba'i 'od

zer rab gtong zhing / /sngon chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /spos rab phul pas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lce rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang

bar smra ba rnam spangs te/ /'jam par smras pas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lus rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /lus btud byas pas lus rnam sbyong ba thob/ /sems

rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na/ /sems rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /gzugs rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku

mthong ste/ /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo/ /sgra rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra ni sgra mi stong par rab tu shes/ /rkyen las byung bas brag ca 'dra'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo/ /

dri rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ /spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/ /ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs

rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /reg rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/ /phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal 'gyur/ /bcos

bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang / /phreng ba bla re phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /chos rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad

kyi/ /spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /byung ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/ /rkyen las byung ba ma skyes ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/ /chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes/ /brjod pas chos

rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste/ /kun kyang las sbyor tha dad tshul can no/ /ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang gA'i bye ma

snyed 'byung ba/ /ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i/ /yon tan de grogs sngon chad gang gyur pa/ /de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/ /drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'di

'dra'o/ /de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/ /rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/ /de dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes/ /gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang / /gang dag yang

yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan 'dun te don gnyer ba/ /de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/ /dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten dag tu 'char/ /mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang

rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /dper rgyan nor bu bzhon pa gzhal med khang / /

bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos/ /de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi/ /phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med/ /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag mod/ /de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /

blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/ /dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni yon tan cher 'gyur mi 'gyur zhes/ /de dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do/ /de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul

ba/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par grub byed cing / /phyogs bcu kun du do zla med rnams kyi/ /zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/ /'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa/ /stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /skyil krung bcas pa'i lus

kyis kun khyab ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing / /sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor/ /de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas/ /drang

srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/ /yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa/ /de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/ /gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/ /skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin

te/ /rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing / /zhabs 'bring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun du ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam

par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldang bar yang / /phyogs bcu kun du rang gi lus ston to/ /de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing / /

nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug /gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /ye shes yon tan phyug

po gzhan nas ldang / /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
