la ShI ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twA ya/ bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yan+t+ri kle sha ka ba d+ha/ a ba ba d+ha bi bi d+ha satwa saM sA ra tsA ra ka pra ma thA na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bI ra bI rA shA ya/ su yan+ta su yan+ta/

ba ra ba ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya/ pra shA sa ya/ gi ri gi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu yu/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha

sa pra ha sa/ bi b+hi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hA man+t+ra du ru ti/ kar+N+Na sha ta pa ra si ka b+ha ba bi sa na/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du

shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab po/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu

'jigs shing dngangs par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to/ /de

nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad rab tu na zhing 'jig

par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skems par byed do/ /lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do/ /yul 'khor rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongs su

srung bar byed do/ /'dre gdon dang / nad dang / sman gyi dug dang / srin bu'i dug dang / log pa dang / ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smras pa

dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas

pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni sgrib pa'i ri

bo shin tu rgya che bdag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu

byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par

de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrung ba bgyid cing / yongs su skyob par bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub

sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na smon lam rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /gzhan yang sems can thams

cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/ rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/ gang zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba

brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun du bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur/ gang zag de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du byang

chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/ btsun pa khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam/ me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/ gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen

po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i gdong dang / mig dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad la rnam par bltas te/ gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa' spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas dri ma dang bral nas sa dang po dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur/

'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab 'thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur

lags so/ /gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang / tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po

gtsang ma bgos te/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor

gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid

na/ tshes lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor bas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas/

lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis yang 'thob par 'gyur lags

so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa

brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so/ /gtsang po dang / chab mig skams pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad kyis thebs pa

thams cad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug pas byabs na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur

lags so/ /gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag mtshams dgum

par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te/ mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su

bsrungs par 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de

dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/ smon lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi

gzungs 'di bzlas te/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan cig bsreg pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal

na rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye

mar btags te/ chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/ yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/ drod dang / dud pa dang / 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /mtshan ma de dag thob

nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang byug par bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum

gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o/ /de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun du sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas 'greng ste/ lus drang por bsrang nas

rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o/ /sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/ lag mthil du bzhag la/ mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo dang / mthe bong ni

yan par brkyang ste/ lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/ phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni lus kun

sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /gal te bdud dang mu stegs can la log par lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par

'gyur lags so/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta/ a bat+ta/ pa ri bat+te/ e hi e hi swA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig

stong dang ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par

bgyis la/ mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i

las ci mchis pa thams cad dus gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud

kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang / kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra NI/ maN+Da la/ e hi e hi/ pra b+hA shud+d+ha/ satwA ya swA hA/

de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ slar bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ spyi bor thal

mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /'das pa'i

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba brnyes pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma dang mthun lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di

bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar

gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du mnan te/ lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag par bgyi ste/ 'di

ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa'i bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang

byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang

bgyir mi rung lags so/ /rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba cig lags na ni ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba

tsak+ShuHka rA ya/ d+hA ra NI/ in+d+rA ya swA hA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang

nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/ 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so/ /gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swA hA/ de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas ting nge

'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bsgreng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung

mo bkug ste nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'dis ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad dang / 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags

te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo la reg par bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por bsgreng nas rtse mo

phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/ lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/ de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya byin lha'i

dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas/ sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/ lag mthil bkan la mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ma hA brah+mA ya

e hi e hi swA hA/ phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o/ /gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/ chab mar la lan

brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o/ /chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sh+lo ka khri lobs par 'gyur lags so/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni

de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so/ /de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas snying gar

thal mo sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyi ga lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgreng sta snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang lags pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par

bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas/ bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su byang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du yon tan 'di lta

bu'i bsngags pa brjod par lags so/ /de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo

mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen mo ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig

stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas

rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sangs rgyas spyan

'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba bud+d+ha sa ma ya/ e hi e hi/ brah+ma shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/ de la byang chub sems

dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de

bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te/ bre mo'i gtam

rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o/ /gzungs las 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o/ /yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag nas

skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyi'o/ /gal te khe la gdu bas slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yang dag

pa'i yongs su dang ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des bsgom par mi bgyid na/ bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag

par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o/ /gal te dbyen tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang / phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang /

rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung bar gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad du ngas khyed srangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/

bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / yang dag pa'i chos dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags

pas/ de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 'dre gdon thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams dang / byi nA ya ka rnams dang / khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags

pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par mi mdzad cing / rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / lha dang / drang srong thams cad kyis dmod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /lam sun 'byin cing

chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang

bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyis nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang / glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par

spyod pa yongs su dag pa srung ba dang / byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum

gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/ /chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i sems

dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang dang / mgo dang / mig la sogs pa yang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/ chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par

nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par sgrub par 'tshal na rin po che dang / 'bru dang / dar zab dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gzugs

brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs

rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing / de dag dus 'di nas

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/ /dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ ri'am/ chab mig 'bab pa'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/ nye 'khor

kun du khru gang yan chad ni shing gi rtsa ba dang / dog sa ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang / spos

chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o/ /de la dbus kyi gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhi lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs

brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba cig bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gling gi

grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas/ nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa'

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan+dan dkar po las bgyis pa cig gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis nas/ sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim

pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/ /shar lho mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen po bri'o/ /lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o/ /nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar

bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gsum pa ni zheng du khru do par bgyis te sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang

bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad du ma bu re re'i nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang /

gri'i phyag rgya dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / byi nA ya

ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas/ phyag rgya de dag kun la'ang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis

pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o/ /

de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi kun du 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs

bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun du rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyis gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o/ /gzhan

yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su dpyangs

te kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu

bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha

brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang / phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon sna

tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/ /'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sder dang / snod spyad dang / bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang / dngul dang / 'khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar

bgyi'o/ /gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lags so/ /'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/ /gdan dang / me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/ /'bras

sA lu'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o/ /sngags mkhan de yang 'byung 'jug gi

tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byugs te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / tu ruSh+ka dang / ga pur la sogs pa bsres te gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang

chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/ /nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhag pa'i mdun du rang gis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag

yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs

nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang

po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin

tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas/ nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad bsgrib cing mchod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam

du 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces

'dri bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams

cad mngon par 'grub pa dang / 'dre gdon thams cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /de ltar smon pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga

'di ni bal ras sam/ btso ras la ri mo bris te bgyis na yang rung lags so/ /smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba bgyis la/ a ga ru bsregs te/ lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ bcu

pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/ smon pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid

bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas/ lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga'

bar 'gyur lags so/ /gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra pa'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul

bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/ /'dre gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na

gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /yul phyogs su rims nad byung bar gyur

na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na chab nyung zad

cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/ gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur

to/ /de'i tshe bram ze tsin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas/ thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po'ang de'i tshe yul

nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang / 'khrug pa 'byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas/ a ga ru bsregs te/ rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su

'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/ bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/ lo lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe

bram ze zhig sgo kun du rgyu zhing zas slong ba las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do/ /de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig

dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang / gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa

las/ deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir nga 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/ khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos

dang / dge 'dun la phul bas/ cho ga 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/ /sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags na/ dkyil 'khor

mi 'tshal te/ phyag rgyas bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la/ myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug

bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba sna tshogs

kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs

te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar 'gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ rgyu dang rkyen des gang

zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs 'dri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar

po khru bcu drug pa'am/ khru nyi shu pa yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/ gdod la mig gsum mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing / sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i

mthil du'ang mig re re bri'o/ /sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do/ /sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so/ /

yang gcig gis ni glegs bam thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni 'khar gsil thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor

lo thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni pad+ma kha bye ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/ /yang gcig gis ni bgrang

phreng thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni zil dngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar

g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so/ /sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs

pa'o/ /kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya rgyad pa nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/ ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/ /lag ngar la ni gdub kor rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis brgyan to/ /lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ /kun du ru'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag yum gyi gzungs

kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/ /gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas/ ri mo 'dri ba'i gnas khang nyen 'khor kun du tsan+dan dkar po'i chab kyis dog sa la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang ri

mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/ /chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/ dkyil

'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar gsum dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos chab dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher

bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams mthol bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa

las 'od zer chen po byung nas/ nyi zla zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri

mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis

pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang lag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan

nas/ bdud chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re

mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la/ mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs

par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang na mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ legs so

legs so/ /ngas kyang byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs

su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig /de

nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi

lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/ /'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu

byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes

bsgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skems par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams bsrung bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma

rungs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/ /rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don

cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang

smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la

byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snying

gar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa

lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bo gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang bsrung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyid do/ /phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas chab

gtsang ma'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/ thal ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas/ de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur

lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di

bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/

bi si bi si bi/ kA ya si bi/ pa la sha pa la ni swA hA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag pa re gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang / gdugs

kyi gung dang / gdugs pas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das

nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces

bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho

ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo / /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug ste/

sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ dus gcig gi tshe yang

lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba

bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang / ye shes

mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nad thams cad kyang

yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na/

dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brdos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/ /

de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor

bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma'i

dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog phor thogs te/ a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas byang

chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa'i spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/ /

gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/ gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad

tshang bar bgyis na/ slad kyis cing bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis nad

gzhibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi

nang du bor te bsreg par bgyi'o/ /'di dag bsreg pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya

rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag sngags 'dis btab na thams

cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ /bsod nams ma mchis

pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i

rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi 'dus sar chos ston pa na klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug

bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las/ de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gcig phul ba dang / bdag gis ni de la yum

gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ /

bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma le/ u ha le/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa hA le/ tsi li te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag

stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig brel zhing

phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas dpung pa g.yon pa la

mdud par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams

cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig

'tshal zhing / dge ba'i sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong

dang lag stong dang ldan pas bdud 'dul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas nongs pa mthol bshags te/ phyag bgyis pa dang /

bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas

sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ snying gar thal mo sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/

thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can

sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o/ /sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par

bgyis te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su 'das pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya' 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so/ /de la byang

chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go/ /

de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o/ /'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i

sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/ /rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon

sum du ma gyur nas/ gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon sum du bzhugs par yid la bgyis te/ gdugs mtshan

gcig la dus drug tu mthol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub

sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bo khu tshur

bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di lta ste/ o~M ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsa ri tsa ri/ tsa

ri le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te/ sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing / snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa

brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar

mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/ g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur

ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/ rim gro bgyid cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang /

'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar bzhag go/ /de'i rjes la sug pa

lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas/ mdzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kaN+Tha/ na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma Ar+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag rgya 'di len tam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur/
dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re

bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud

pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas/ de'i mgul du btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yul gang du ltas ngan dang / rims nad byung

ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad+ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang

chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag

par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos

sdig rnam pa sna tshogs pa bgyis pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re yang bskal pa re re la mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang zag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang

gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan

sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas/ rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/

de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang

pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi

'tshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon

pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par bsgreng ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus

po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na drang srong 'phur te mchi ba dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/

sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di lta ste/ o~M a ro li ka te le/ lo ki bi do ya/ sarba ya dru/ pra mar+d+ha na ka rA ya pu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //
zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin

gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang po

dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ gos tshags bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang

na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin

po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod

kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar

stan la 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/

tad+ya thA/ o~M tsakra pa ti tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha te/ badzra b+ha ra/ A ka rA ya hU~M swA hA/ 'di ni lus kyi sngags lags so/ /o~M pad+me/ tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA badzra b+ha ra hU~M/ 'di ni snying po'i sngags lags so/ o~M b+ha ra ta pad+me hU~M/ 'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngags lags

so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam

mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal

po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad kyang phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams

thar te/ lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir

gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs

kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong

ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs

'di mi bskyud par bgyis te gdugs dang dus mi 'dam bar gtsang yang rung / mi gtsang yang rung ste/ g.yar ston du bzlas par gyur na bgyi ba rnams don dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /ci yang rung ste/ don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang /

sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/ /gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/

las ngan pa dang gdon bgegs dang bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba'am/ rlung dang / mkhris

pa'am/ bad kan la sogs pas bro 'chal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ lhog pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze

nad dam/ phol mig gam/ rlung nad dam/ smyos pa'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / mid pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib

logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rked pa dang / rgyab dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid

lags so/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bi nA ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs dang / chab dang / zhugs dang /

rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed

par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang / rkang mang dang / gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa

bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid

bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig /

ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos

po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

gnas ri po Ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal

du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi

spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dang dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta

ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis

dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel

zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad

dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu'am/ btsun mo'am/ slas sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol

pa'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la bsten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer

zhing rgyal po la bsten par 'tshal na dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na lan

brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i bu mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal rigs

la bsten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o/ /gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o/ /khye'u gzhon nu

dang bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan drug cu'o/ /'di ni bsten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so/ /gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' bdag ring po na mchi

ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsams pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon

sum du bstan nas/ de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te sangs rgyas dang 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur

lags so/ /gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsol nas yongs su srung bar bgyid de/

zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas/ de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams

yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /byang chub sems spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod

las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar

nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ gi'u wang dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / dza ti pha la

dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te/ snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/

mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / bran rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu

sems bskyed nas/ lus kyi zho sha dang / nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/ brjod kyis mi lang lags so/ /ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur

lags so/ /gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa dang /

mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /sman 'dis

bdugs pas bab chol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi

'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyar ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi

yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum zhib mor btags te/ gi'u wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ chab gtsang mas

sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/ yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas/ ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam

pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/ ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na bkur sti bgyis nas/ nor dang rin po che dag phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci

'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba cig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor

gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram zhing / tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang / bla re dkar po bres te/ dkyil 'khor

gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o/ /lus kyi sngags kyang

lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsregs te/ me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad

'grub par 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin tsan+dan gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho

ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la

snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ sman shi ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma le brgan dang / pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / nya rkun mnag po'i rus pa dang / ba bla dang /

ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / rgya'i gur gum dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na gla rtsi dang / ga bur srang

phyed stsal nas zhib tu bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems
