bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams

cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar dang / long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so/ /rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags

so/ /gdugs gnyis stsal na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gsum stsal na smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /

gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / byad stems thams cad rnam

par 'joms shing / ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro/ /zhag

bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas byad stems dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang 'dre srin sde brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes

su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an+t+rad nar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo

rang bye nas de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas/

tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan bar 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod

par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas blta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag

sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rlung

gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems

can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams

yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal pa gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid che par bgyi zhing /

sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan nor bu'i

'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis

gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi nA ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar

zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg ho~M bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas me tog ma len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang /

sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te/ thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags

kyis btab ste/ zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so/ /zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par ho~M gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong

thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag

bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha dang rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar

'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na yungs kar dang chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar

du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char ba 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char che ste mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ gnam du gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag

po glo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus

'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la zhig

gis lan cig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byas pa

legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yin mod kyi ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes

su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dang 'gal bar ma byed cig dang nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so/ /sems

can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom

ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor

'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las sbyin sreg hoM gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //

'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lots+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis
rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di

ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang sdig pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum

pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung bar bgyi ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /

yongs su gzung bar bgyis pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang

bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs

pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/ thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du

gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/ de ltar bdag gis snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lags so/ /de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par

bya'o/ /gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o/ /nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i tshogs rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang / lus la dug

gis mi tshugs pa dang dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang rims kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / mtshon chas mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba

dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba

dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te 'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung

bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so/ /bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang

chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so/ /gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang / chab dang zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas pa dang / bskyab pa dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste/ bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/ /lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag

kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci

'tshal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi'am/ lnga la smyung ba bgyis na de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming

'dzin pa ni don mchis te/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so/ /bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad

dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing

rjes su yi rang ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po

'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+ha teb+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni bsgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/

rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dre dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / bas bldags la sogs

pa dang / dug dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o/ /lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do/ /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro/ /rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro/ /

sna bro 'tshal ba la gro ba btags na des zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyi ste bklags pas 'grub po/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po

shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA mASh+Ta sha ta kaM /bod skad du/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas

pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bun da'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kun du 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha

ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas te/ yongs

su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs

su gsal ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /

bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas/ /khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/ /srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad/ /yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems/ /shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/ /klu chen po ni cang shes po/ /sems la dbang

sgyur thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob/ /ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs/ /srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu rgal/ /gzhan la phan pa mdzad le brtson/ /thugs rje dang ni 'brel pa'i thugs/ /skye dgu kun
la mchog tu byams/ /bde bar brtson pa byams las byung / /mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas/ /bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes/ /bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'/ /khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /

'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ /dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/ /rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/ /mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes/ /n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/ /

dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang / /sku ni rnam pa kun du brgyan/ /sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /sku tshad che la dkar sham po/ /nA ga ge sar gzhon nu ltar/ /cung zad dmar pa 'dra ba'i mdog /dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /thor

tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs/ /dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ /'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro/ /'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar/ /gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab/ /gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che/ /shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi/ /

nyi ma'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yi/ /se ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan/ /sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod/ /tshul khrims mnyams ral ba med/ /mthon ka seng ge'i ral pa 'dra/ /sku ni

'jam zhing ldem bag can/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra/ /g.yas su 'khyil pa'i dung yang 'dra/ /dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra/ /dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che/ /smin mtshams bar yang yong ma chad/ /spyan ni nor bu rin

chen 'bar/ /shangs kyi dbyibs kyang cung zad mtho/ /tshems kyi sgros kyis rnam par gnon/ /ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing / /snyan gyi khung yang rab tu zab/ /mgur kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra/ /dpung pa dag kyang rab

tu zlum/ /phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring / /sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar/ /phyag sor rnams kyi bar yang 'brel/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la/ /'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes/ /

sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas/ /gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan/ /yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba/ /pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra/ /pad+ma dag las kun du skyes/ /pad+ma dag

gi gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnams/ /ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams/ /kriSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa man bas/ /dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /bkra shis dag gis gtsang mar gyur/ /snga nas gsung zhing gsong por

gsung / /bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad/ /bzang por snang ba'i ljon shing ltar/ /sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags/ /

bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/ /ba spu nyag ma re re yang / /sems can rnams kyi gtso bor gyur/ /bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad/ /bshol ba med cing nges par mdzad/ /rab tu

drag pa'i brtson 'grus can/ /'khor ba dag las rab tu rgal/ /dam chos rgyal tshab mnga' gsol ba/ /yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor/ /don yod zhags pas sdug bsngal 'dren/ /ha ya gr-i ba bdud bzhi 'joms/ /kro d+ha mgrin sngon

gdug pa sel/ /chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las sgrol/ /lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang / /khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed/ /rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan/ /mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan/ /yon tan ldan zhing

byams dang ldan/ /shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan/ /don rnams kun ni rig pa po/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/ /chos rnams thams cad smra ba po/ /'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po/ /

zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan/ /gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas/ /'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag /tshangs pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad kyis gang zhig stod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du

yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o/ /mnar med par mi 'gro'o/ /su zhig nang par langs nas klog gam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang glo na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las

thar bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gar skyes gar gnas kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang

phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /

tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel

rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/

'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das po Ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a ti mug ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag

par brgyan par/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs

cig tu bzhugs so/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos

phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag

la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yang 'dus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don

yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang

phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod

rten du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i

rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas dang

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de/ gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i

skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru ba'am/ tshad ba'am/
lag pa na pa'am/ rkang pa na ba'am/ mgo na ba'am/ ha la ha la yis btags pa'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu'am/ 'brum bu phra mo'am/ lhog pa'am/ 'bras sam/ bye'u 'bras sam/ g.yan pa'am/ mtshan ma rdol
ba'am/ 'brum bu'am/ brjed byed dam/ khyab par na ba'am/ gsod pa'am/ 'ching ba'am/ rdeg pa'am/ bsdigs pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod pa'am/ mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/ sems kyi sdug

bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang /

rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/ gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang / don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'dri bar byed pa/ 'drir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/

sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa'am tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang / dor ba med pa/ gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang

dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/ sgyu med pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/ phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas

brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/ /ji snyed po tir bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa'am

rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grag par 'gyur ro/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan+dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba'am sa la gzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na de la tsan+dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur ba'am

brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed

pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das dmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la'ang ngo / /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / bsod

nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do/ /gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen

ma'am/ de las gzhan pa kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te/ lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs su bzlas na/ de la bcom

ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /nyi shu po gang zhe na/ gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang / las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus

dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang / nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/ /nor yod pa yang rkun pos khyer bar mi nus so/ /mes mi 'tshig go/ /chus mi khyer ro/ /rgyal po'i

yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/ /de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po

chu'am thal ba la yongs su bsngags te/ phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar

'gyur ro/ /dgra yis 'jigs pa byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /me yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa drag po'ang

'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru byams pa dang / snying rje dang /

dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge

slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba 'khrul ba med do/ /lag pa g.yob pa med do/ /bshang ba med do/ /gci ba med do/ /rlung gi rnam pa med

do/ /shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de

dang de ru skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang / btsong dang / sgog skya dang / bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du bsrung bar 'dod pas

de rnams spang bar bya'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang / ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni

byang chub sems dpa' yin no/ /sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/ /shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/ de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don

nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /

phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das gson cig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang / skye dgu'i

tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang / rnam par thar ba'i don gyi phyir yang ngo / /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/ na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+hAr+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yo\u0f85tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pa n+ne b+h+yaH/ na maHsaM myak+ga tA nAM/ na maHsaM

myak+p+ra t+yut+pan+nA nAM/ na maHshA ra dwa tI pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shi len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo\u0f85R+had+b+h+yaH/ saM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/ na maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa

bi na rdi te shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha bi krI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHa mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+thi te ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta rasmyut+ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi ba sh+yi ne ta thA

ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshA na dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAR+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+ha

ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ o~M sha me sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba sa twAMsh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kIrti ta nA mad+he yA ya shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+t+ra wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/

na maHin+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo \u0f85pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi krAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/

na mo \u0f85tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+ne b+ho bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti baR+d+ha ni/ ma ti baR+d+ha ni/ ga ti baR+d+ha ni/ d+h+r-i ti baR+d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA baR+d+ha ni/ pra ti b+hA na baR+d+ha ni/ d+h+yA na baR+d+ha ni/ shA mas+thA baR+d+ha ni/ pi pa sh+ya na baR+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi pak+Sha d+harma baR+d+ha ni/ sa

ka la bud+d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra NA+e ya swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hAs+thA ma brAp+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo nam skri twA/ i da mAr+yA ba lo

ki te shwa ra mu khot+gir+N+Na/ a mo g+ha pA sha rA dza nA ma hri da yaM ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hu Shi taM/ ma ha tAM paR+Shan+mad+h+ye a ha mi dA nI mA baR+ta yiSh+yA mi sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dAHsarba kAr+yA Ni/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu

ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu

ku lu swA hA/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ bod+ha bod+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+tha ma prap+ta/ tsa la tsa la/

sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ eh+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/

ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ o~M kA ra prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/

ha ra ha ra/ ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+hA Sha b+hA Sha/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wAn+sau ma/ A di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ pra h+man+d+ra/ bA yu/ a g+ni/ d+ha na dA/ de ba/ r-i Shi gaNA b+h+yar+ts+tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su

ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa nat+ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na dA/ bA yu/ ag+ni r-i shi/ nA ya ka /bi nA ya ka pa hu bi bid+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/

g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ki shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra/

mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo ba sarge b+h+yaH/ sarbo gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba pi She b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+wa ra b+h+yaH/ e ba~M/ baM d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/

ta rdza na/ rA dza/ ta ska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka /bi Sha/ shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ma/ ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tu rAr+ya sat+ya sa~M pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/

ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA ha mo\u0f85n+d+ha kA ra bi d+ha man/ ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu

Tu Tu/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e ne ya tsaR+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka /ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/

sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe te ya dz+nyA+o pa bI Ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nya shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA mu ku Ta/ ma hA ad+d+hu

ta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+h+yA na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+ShA pra kam+b+ya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karmA wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba dz+nya dz+nyA na pa ri bU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba

satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ i mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra sai ne ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya

pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mri t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me karma ku ru na maHstu te swA hA/ o~M ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M dza ye hU~M phaT swA hA/

o~M dzra dzriM dzuM swA hA/ o~M hU~M dza ya swA hA/ o~M hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M pa su pa ti swA hA/ o~M A ro li ka swA hA/ o~M ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/ o~M A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA ni ya ta be da nI yA shu

b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wA na karma No\u0f85she Sha tAHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ o~M pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ a~M bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /las

kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo / /rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/ /

nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ /lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas gcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/ /lto ba na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa'am/ 'jim bag gam/ chus kyang bya'o/

mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/ /so'i nad la ka ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/ /mtshams bcing ba la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab pa

byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no/ /thams cad du srung skud dam/ chu'am/ thal bas bya'o/ /gza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / ba

spu byi ba dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o/ /mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/ rgya skyegs kyi chu'am/ sbrang rtsi'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i dus thams cad

du rtsod pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o/ /yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing

bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas na sems can thams cad bsrung ba yin no/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / yams rnams zhi ba yin no/ /phyag rgya tsan+dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar

du yongs su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na khyim bsrung pa'o/ /pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi bsrung ba'o/ /tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / /'byung po

dang / rgyu skar thams cad las bsrung ba'o/ /rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i na gu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang /

dri'i pri yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nat+ta zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas

mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o/ /bud med rnams kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do/ /g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro/ /nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams

cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /dug dang mes mi tshugs so/ /dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / sprin dang / thog ni chus

rengs par byed do/ /ka ra pI ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do/ /de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus

pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba kyi pags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /

lha bzo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /nye bar spyod pa brgyad

dang / nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/ /a ka ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa'am/ dkar gsum za zhing / dus gsum du

khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs

par byed do/ /ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/ /sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de

'dis byed do zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i

ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ da sha b+hU mi d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sa bcu

pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor bsgrub par 'gyur ba ni/ o~M zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil

'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar

gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do/ /gsang sngags o~M zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/ /o~M b+huH/ yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas

brjod byas na sa gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan snga na 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi las

ngan gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod zhags

pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gnyis pa'o/ /o~M pad+me/ gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin

pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor

ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /yi ge gsum pa'o/ /o~M pad+ma hrIH/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod

byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba

rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/ /mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing

tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sa bzhi pa'o/ /o~M pad+ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad do/ /sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/ rig

sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i

rtsa ba mtshungs pa med par skyed par 'gyur zhing / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rim par phye ba 'grub cing /

rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad kyis shig /yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /sa lnga ba'o/ /o~M pad+ma lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug

pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par

dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog /las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing / khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams ni bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing

thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs spyi ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/

'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig /o~M pad+ma dz+wa la hU~M d+h+r-i ka /yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba

thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing

thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/

rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba ces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod zhags pa

pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying por rnam par sprul ba grub kyis/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig /oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/ gzungs kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che me shel

ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa rang

gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog pa mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/

rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/ /rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel pa'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog /der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed

par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis 'jig rten dang / /'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig /oM pad+ma lo tsa ne hu ru hU~M/ gzungs sngags yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas

brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du

ston cing / /sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad de legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyangs

pa'i las legs par sgrub par byas so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa grub ste/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / mdo sde dang lung dang bcas pa sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas

bstan pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin no/ /o~M pad+mo Sh+NI Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par gyur nas sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod zhags

pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma

la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/ /sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pA ra mi tA Shan+pa ri pU ra kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mo g+ha

pA sha ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA pA ri pU ra ya hU~M/ da ra da ra/ bi bad+hi/ bi tsi traiH/ sarba satwA u pa b+ho ga /sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na pU dza me g+ha pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya ma hA pad+ma ma Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po

chen po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas ni mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud+d+ha sa twa pad+ma bi

b+hA Shi ta/ b+hu dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas smyung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dran pas brjod par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas

brjod bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du

grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par byed na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas smyung bar gnas pa byas te/ gzungs 'di bzlas brjod

byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mo g+ha k+ShAn+ti sarba bo d+hi sa twa k+Sha mi Ni/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na ma hA mai tri kA ru Na/ sarba satwa bat+sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba satwa k+Sha mi Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la

bzod pa dang / bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dang / bya dang / ltos 'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas

pa gang yin pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de sems can dmyal ba dang / dang / dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur

zhing / skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M ma hA bIr+ya a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dr-i d+ha bIr+ya ma hA ba la/

ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+ya~M ga /ba la/ bo d+ha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu dran pa'am/ yongs su dag cing spro ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'di yid la byed pa dang ldan

pas dge ba sna 'ga' tsam byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ myur bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi

'bral bar 'gyur/ brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mo g+ha kA ru Na/ d+h+yA na/ sa mA d+hi/ sarba bi mok+Sha/ a pra ka m+b+ya ka /tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na dran pa tsam

gyi mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod

byas pa tsam gyi mod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mo g+ha ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA a ba b+hA sa swa b+hA ba/ sa maM ta sA ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud+d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bA na pradz+nyA a ba lo ki te tsak+Shu ShaM ma hA pradz+nyA/ ba ra da

ma Ni ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad+ma d+hA ri Ni b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu

rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas

rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi blo dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu

ldan par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don

yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lots+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang
bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos

phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla

ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun du bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /las

kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /

pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag

tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rgya mtsho phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor

gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ /mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ /phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur

bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing / 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig /de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha ga me/ tsak+Shu/ kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+h+rA Na kha be/ dzi hwa kha be/ kA ya kha be/ ma na kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ shU

na tra kha be/ a na mi ta kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mA d+hi kha be/ pA ra mi tA kha be/ bo d+hi kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ka la ka la ka la/ sang+g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na mo dwA na ba tI nAM/ bud+d+ha

ko TI nAM/ a d+hiSh+Than+tu mAM/ tsa ta sra paR+Sha do A yur ba lany+tsa da dan+tu/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA

satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa mr-i dAn+tu mAM/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+hA ra NI swA hA/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'

dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang bar langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o/ /

so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/ /rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o/ /klad pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/ /

lto na ba la bya ba par bgyi'o/ /gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byug go/ /nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o/ /'di

ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o/ /ji ste sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des

sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ bum pa gang pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la/ tsan+dan dang a ka ru dang kun du ru'i

bdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti li ban d+hA mi/ mi li ban d+hA mi/ tsi li mi li ban d+hA mi/ sI mi ban d+hA mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur

mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi le li/ e hi

b+ha ga bA na/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya swA hA/ 'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum

du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brdze bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad

bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs su de

bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag

rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI la kaN+Tha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par

gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob

par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ril 'dzeg par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag

nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i

ri de rang snyil zhing zhig par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag gshin

rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na rnams rang tshim par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra

yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dro ts+tshoSha na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba it+yu pa dra ba/ bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu

tA ra NA ya/ ta s+ya nA ma skr-i twA/ i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da yaM/ A baR+ta yiSh+yA mi/ sarbA R+tha sA d+ha na na/ shu b+ha tse ta naM/ sarba b+hU tAnAM/ pA pa mAR+ga bi sho d+ha kaM /tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ a

d+hi ba ti/ lo kA ti krAn+te/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ he bo ng+hi sa twa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA sma ra hr-i da yaM e h+ye hi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ba ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karmA sA d+ha ya/

sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yA na/ de hi de hi me rang+ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIr+yan+te/ ma hA bir+yAn+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ren+d+re shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mUrte/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+NA dzi na/ dza TA mu ku TA/ a laM kr-i ta/

sha rI ra lam b+ha/ pra lam ba/ bi lam pa/ ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha/ kr-iSh+Na pA na nir+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma ha sta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ nish+tsa re shwa ra kr-iSh+Na

sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/ ma hA bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na/ rU pa ba la be ga d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi ma hA ha la ha la/ bi Na ni rdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA

sha na/ mo ha bi Sha bi nA sha na ni rmo k+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA hu lu ha re/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bu d+h+ya/ bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/ bA ma s+thi ta/ ma hA sid+ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa

muny+tsa/ ma hAT+Ta T+Ta hA sa/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra/ b+ha Na b+ha Na/ bA tsa na/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yA na/ sma ra sma ra twaM b+ha ga paM taM/ lo kA nu pi lo ki taM/ ta thA ga ta taM/ de hi de hi/ me daR+sha na kA ma s+ya/ daR+sha naM pra sA d+hA ya me swA hA/ sid+d+hA

ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sing ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sing ha mu khA ya swA hA/ badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha

rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo d+ha ra bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shad+kha shab+da niR+NA da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma s+thi ta kan+d+ha de sha kr-iSh+Na dzi nA ya swA hA/

byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA yo gi nI shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu
me man+t+ra ba dA ni swA hA/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha'i gzungs rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ya grI ba d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa nA ga ti ne/ na maH

sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa na/ A ba ha ri Ni/ na maHsarba satwa b+ha yot+ta ra NA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba/ pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsi kit+saM ka rA ya/ na maHsarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba duHkha pra mo k+Sha na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba an+b+ha

ka rA bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba bi d+yA rA dza/ ba sha prAp+ta ye/ ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya ta s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khot+gIr+NaM r-i Shi bi da dA/ de ba nA ga/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ shAkya pra h+ma/ lo ka pA la biSh+NA ma he shwa ra/ na rA ya NA/ skan+d+ha

ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ra/ ma tr-i ga Na/ na ma skri taM/ badzra khu ra sa hi yaM/ ha ya grI ba pra h+ma/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya/ ma brta yiSh+yA mi/ a ba pra me yAr+ha sa d+ha kaM/ a ba h+yaM/ arba b+hU tA nAM/ sarba bi g+h+na bi nA ya kaM/ a mo g+haM/ sarba karma NaM/ bi shA nany+tsa

bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M ta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ sarba b+hU ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/ a na li/ bi spu ling+ga/ aT+Ta hA sa/ ke sa ra/ a to pA/ pra bi ta ka yaM badzra khu ra ni rga ti ta/ tsa li ta bA su dA ta la/ badzrod shwa se

ta/ hA si ta ma ru to k+Sha ti/ pra sha man ka ra/ pa ra duSh+Ta bi g+h+na na/ saM b+ha k+Sha Na ka ra/ swa bi d+d+ho pa de sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha yA mi te/ b+ha ga bA na ha ya grI ba/ sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/ mA brta yiSh+yA mi/ khA da khA da/ ma hA rau dra/

man+t+ran/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ At+ma swa hi tA na man+t+ran/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ sarba karme Shu me/ sid+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha A be sha/ pra be sha pra be sha/ sarba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba ba ro pa

gra ma/ kr-i ta ka khordo/ dur lad+g+hi ta/ mu shi ka/ bi Sha ka ra/ bi Sha daM Sh+Ta bi Sha tsUr+Na yo a b+hi tsA ra biSha ka ra Na/ sid+d+ha any+dza na/ tsak+Shu rmo ha na/ tsit+ta bA k+She pa na ka ra/ Ni t+ya/ a ba ra pre k+Sha Na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA bo

d+hi sa twa r-id+b+h+ya daMSh+Ta Ne na/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nAM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA taM/ me karma/ shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra daMSh+Tod ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+he ra bA ya phaT/ pa ra man+tA na nA sha na ka rA ya
