gzungs sngags gzhi rnams smras pa legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog

pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li tsi li swA hA/ prah+ma swa re swA hA/ prah+ma a ba su gar+b+he/ a ka la be/ pu Sha saM sta re swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang nang

par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis gzungs

sngags gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi tsit+te/ pa ra Ni/ da mA raN+De/ dit+ta tit+tit+ti gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri sa ra ma tan+ta/ badzra tu la ni/ dz+wA la mA la li ni/ tsakra bA ka/ sha ba re sha ba re/ sha ma re sha ma re swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen

po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs

su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ bo d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ d+hu ma pa ri ha re/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shAn+te/ ni ra muk+te/ mang+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ sta re sta pa ti swA hA/ de nas 'byung po'i

ma mo 'phrog mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa'i

rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ pi li si pa pi li/ si li/ ma hA pi pi li/ si me li si/ gu ru Ne/ gu ru gu ru Ne

ma hA gu ru Ne phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po

zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aT+Te phu/ baT+Te phu/ naT+Te phu/ ku naT+Te phu/ ma naT+Te phu/ muN+Da

ta ha ke phu/ shri phu b+haM ge phu/ ma~M ge phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /

chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi badzre/ he badzre/ hI hA/ bi si bi si/ ma hA bi si phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par

bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu lu/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas sde dpon gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams

brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha na~M ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang

bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a~M ge/ ba~M ge/ tsa~M ge/ hi ni/ Di Di/ di di tsi tsi phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha

te/ bi ha te/ ni ha te/ sarba pra t+ya rI kA/ pra t+yA/ mi tra shud+d+he/ mu k+te/ bi muk+ti/ bi ma le/ ni rma le/ pra b+ha swa re/ pra b+ha ka re phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ tad+ya

thA/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le dz+wa la/ dz+wa le ni uk+ke muk+ke/ sha me pra sha me/ ma hA pra sha me/ sha me sa mAd+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ sa mA ba d+he/ dz+wa le ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ba me phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /

nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ u duM ba re/ u duM pe pra duM be/ byA brde/ A na g+he/ sa mA d+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ nI le nI le/

nI la ke she ke she ni/ ku le ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ ma no ha re/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ sa ma the/ ba ba la/ ku tse/ dAn+te/ nI la ka she/ ku le/ nI la/ dAn+te dzAM gu le/ hu she/ mU she/ ba laM

ku she/ ha la ku she/ pha la mu tse swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag

gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/

ni ra ma le/ ma~M ga le/ hi ra n+ya gar+b+he/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ ka mash+tsi ni yu bi ra dze/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kaM ba le prah+ma/ prah+ma swa re/ prah+ma sid+d+he/ sid+d+hi ma nor the gu swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su

thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi

bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ badzra da ni/ bud+d+ha badzre/

bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badzre/ su bud+d+he/ ni bud+d+he/ ba hu bud+d+he/ bi shi Sh+Ta bud+d+he/ shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ nI sha~M grA ma Ni/ dzaM ge le/ a la se/ ti li me/ ti le/ ti li le/ marge/ shAn+ta shAn+ta gA mI ni phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi

bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le badzre/ he hi badzre/ he he badzra ya ba ki ri ki ri badzra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra ba si ni/ kin+na re/ ka rA de/ ke yU re/ e ha bud+d+he/ ta twa bud+d+he/

b+hU dze b+hU dze/ b+hU dza~M ga me/ b+hU dza pA ba te/ b+ha ye b+ha ye/ b+ha ya a gra ba te/ bi nI bi nI/ shi ra pa the/ shi ba pa the/ A dit+ya pa the/ te dze te dza ba to/ /A kA sha pa the phu swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar

ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Ti ni/ ku Ta ku Ta re swA hA/ nI li nI le/ nI la ke she swA hA/ pI te pI te/ pI ta ke she swA hA/ lo hi te/ lo hi te/ lo hi ta ke she swA hA/ a ba dA de/ a

ba dA de/ a ba dA ta ke ni swA hA/ many+dziSh+The/ many+dziSh+The/ many+dziSh+The ke she swA hA/ tsakre tsakre/ badzra tsakre swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten

skyong ba thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs sngags gzhi 'di

dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'

lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa

dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /

'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan
la phab pa//@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Shan+mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad

bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phye bar spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu

bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zung shig /de ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba

nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig /bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de sems can thams

cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig /bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma bshags par ma gyur cig /bdag gis bdud kyi las gang ci byas pa de yongs su shes pa

bla na med pas yongs su mi shes par ma gyur cig /bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung gang ci yod pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig /bdag gi rnam

par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ oM k+Sha me k+Sha me/ k+ShAn+te k+ShA n+te/ da me da me/ dAn+te dAn+te/ b+ha dre b+ha dre/ su

b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/ su tsan+d+re su tsan+d+re/ tsan+d+ra ki ra Ne/ tsan+d+ra ba ti/ te dzo ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ d+harma ba ti/ brah+ma ba ti/ sarba kle sha bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni/ pa ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ kA

ya bi sho d+ha ni/ bA ga bi shwa d+ha ni/ ma naHsa~M shwa d+ha ni swA hA/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bklags na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang

nas skye bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de
dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Da k+Sha ra bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ dan+ti le/ kan+ti le/ daN+Di ma

ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma raN+De/ ko raN+De/ drA bi ti/ ko shA ri/ tsha Ta dze/ du du ma ti/ ke tu ma ti/ tsu dun+d+he/ kau Ta dAn+te/ ta hu ra re/ e na ni ge/ hu ta ba hu ni/ kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags te/ klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba

dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / sna na ba dang / lce na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba

dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / lbos pa dang / mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur ba dang / rims drag po dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin

gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung

ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcing ba byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i

dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du mi 'gas pa ni/ kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ ka ra te/ ke yU re/ b+hU ta~M ga me/ b+hU ta ga he/ b+hU ta pra k+Shi te/ b+hU ta ya sma ra ya ni/ pri yA ba ti/ te dza ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ gi rI Ni ni/ sha ri Ni ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa

thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ gA thA dwi tI ya d+hA ra nI/ bod skad du/ tshigs su

bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / /le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin/ /'dod chags dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang / /'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa

rnams/ /sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste/ /de yi gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa/ /de yis bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ /nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ oM badzra pra kA ra/ badzra pra kA ra/ badzra tsakra/ da~MSh+TA b+ha

ya na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud+d+he swA hA/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni/ /tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba/ /sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des/ /phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob

par 'gyur/ /khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur ba dang / /'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang / /thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang / /
de bzhin de dag las ni theg mchog thos/ /mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang / /sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du 'thob/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ru tsi ra a~M ga yaSh+Thi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo bi pu la

bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te a sa~M khe ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza/ pra b+ha a ba b+ha se ta mUrta ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la/ a la~M ka ra d+hA ri Ne b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa ya sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biSh+Tha/ sarba

satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA A lo ka ka raN ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi nA sha ka/ rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka rak+Sha ka/ sarba a pA ya durga ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ sarba A sha

pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa~M b+ha na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ ba ra ba ra dA ya ka/ pad+ma A lo ka sa~M b+ha ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ dza TA mu ku Ta/ a la~M kr-i ta shi rA/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/ sha ta badzra baiDUr+ya a la~M kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la

a la~M kr-i ta/ pra b+ha ra Na rA dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la Shi ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa bar bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yA~M tra kle sha ka ba TA a ba bad+d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa saM sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga

ra/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bi ha/ bi ra bi ra dza/ su dAn+ta pa ri bri ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa yA/ pra shA sa yA/ pra d+h+wa na sA ya/ pra d+h+wan sA ya/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi bi ri/

bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na/ bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ g+ha ya g+ha ya/ g+hA d+ha ya g+hA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ nA nA bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa nA/ ha ra ha ra/

sa~M nya ra sa~M ha ra/ d+hu ru Ti/ d+hu ru Ti/ ma hA maN+Da a laM ka ra Na/ sha ta pra se ka/ a ba bA si ta ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ byang

chub sems dpa'i khang dam pa/ rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / mi'am ci dang lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen po mang pos

bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lag

na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes

su dran par byas la/ lan bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba

'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo khyad du 'phags pas

bkur bar 'gyur ro/ /me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba yang de la skye bar 'gyur/ dam pa chen po dang

ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob

par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams

cad zad par byed par 'dod na/ tshes lnga'i zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang bcom

ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos kyi bsti stang byas te de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des

sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang / sa dang pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs dang / ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do/ /gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas

na char 'bab bo/ /sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro/ /'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas brjod byas

na sos par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bkres pa dang skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro/ /mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na dpag tshad tshun chad mtshams gcad pa dang bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen

gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi gar+b+hA lang+kA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la ba da na kAny+tsa nod k+Ship+ta/ pra b+hA sa ke tu mur+d+ha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/

aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ ta d+yathA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+hA re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta ra smi sany+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shik+te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/

sarba bud+d+ha NA ba b+ha se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+thi te/ na b+ha sta le/ sha me sha me/ pra sha me pra sha me/ sarba pA pa~M pra sha ma ne/ sarba pA pa~M bi shwa d+ha ne/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he

swA hA/ mU la man+t+raM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ hr-i da ya~M/ o~M hu ru hu ru dza ya mu khe swA hA/ u pa hr-i da ya~M/ o~M badzra A yu She swA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan

yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/ des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang / phreng

ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon

mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tshom za ba dang / mtshams med

pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/ /dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas

pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing

'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig
rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs // //

@#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang / cho ga

ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sU k+Sha me sU k+Sha me sa me sa ma ye/ shAn+te dAn+te a sa mA

ro pe a nA laM pe ta ra la be/ ya shwa ba ti/ ma hA te dzo ni rA ku le ni ra bA Ne/ sarba bud+d+ha ad+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i 'jim pa'am/ sngags bri ba'i tshe lan bdun du gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ o~M badzra A yu She

swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags la/ oM badzrod b+ha ba ya swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma gdab pa'am/ 'bru mar byug pa'i sngags la/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ phyag rgya'am/ sngags gzhug pa'i sngags la/ o~M d+harma d+hA

tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tho bas rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ o~M badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bu nas phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la/ o~M d+harma ra te swA hA/ 'khor

lo dang / dbu zhu gsol ba'i snga gsal/ oM b+h+ra ma Na ye swA hA/ tsai t+ya'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha ta badzra swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tsai t+ya btab pas bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /

dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bar bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs // //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsU Da ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa/ 'jigs pa thams

cad las rnam par thar par mdzad pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ mi mthun pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms

par mdzad pa/ 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge dang / mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa

thams cad zlog par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/ dug dang / 'brum phran

dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshed byed thams cad sel bar byed/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/ /nor dang

'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa/ /bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dang / /g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa/ /phyir zlog pa 'di brjod par bya/ /lha dang lha min g.yul bkye ste/ /brgya byin lha min rnams las pham/ /de nas rings pa kho nar

ni/ /'jig rten dbang gi drung 'ongs te/ /de nas snying ni rab skrag pas/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to/ /lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang / /ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/ /'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni/ /lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu

gzigs/ /brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas/ /dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs/ /lha yi dbang po nga la nyon/ /khyod la ngas ni srung ba sbyin/ /lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes

bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo / /mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di/ /

bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa'am/ /'don tam 'on te klog na yang / /de yi 'jigs pa kun med de/ /rtag tu bsrung zhing sba ba dang / /g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/ /sdig dang rmi ngan zhi ba dang / /bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel/ /

lha yi dbang po de bas na/ /gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas/ /bris te spyi bor gdags par bya/ /yid la rtag tu dran par gyis/ /g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ /'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog /bud med rnams la bu pho skyed/ /mngal

na gnas pa yongs su skyong / /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig /'di med phyir zlog byed ces bya/ /yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed/ /lha'i dbang po phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo

sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lha ma yin rnams pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung shig /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M dza ya ka ri/ yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni bi tsi tra mu khi/ sarba mang+ga la d+hA ra Ni/ dzI mU te/ sa ha sra b+hu dze/

sa ha sra ne tre/ sa ha sra shi ra se/ nA nA lang kA rA/ b+hi b+hU Shi te/ ma Ni kuN+Da la saM nA ha san+na d+he bi tsi tra mau li d+ha re/ tsan+da sUr+ya a ti re ke/ A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/ mang+ga la shi re dzI mU te/ pa bI tra kr-i ta mang+ga l+ye/ b+hU ri ma d+h+ri ka ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/

shwe te pa ste/ mu ru mu ru shwe te/ a ba nat+te/ hu ru hu ru/ pa bi tra mu khi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ A di t+ya pa sha brti ni/ dzam+b+ha Ni/ mang+ga la d+hA ra Ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ sarba bid+yA d+harma te/ mo ha ne/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/ rA

dza tsau ra ag+ni pi Sha u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/ ka kho rda ni bA ra Ni/ o~M hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te dza ska ri/ bi bA da pra sha ma ni/ yud+d+ha ni/ bA ra Ni/ pa ra tsakra pra sha ma ni/ pa ra sai n+ya bi nA sha ni/ yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni/ bra b+hU ta be

la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma NI na d+ha ri/ tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ tri pu ra na ga ra/ bi d+han+sa ni/ ba ra sai n+ya bi dra ba ni/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ni sU da ni/ sarba bya d+hI nAM pra sha ma ni/ o~M tsi li mi le swA hA/ tsi le mi le swA hA/ mi

li mi li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tsa khi li tsa khi li swA hA/ tsaN+Da li mi Ti ni swA hA/ U ra d+ha ke shi ping+ga le/ ping+ga lA k+She da d+hi mu khi swA hA/ o~M ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ muny+tsA pa ya/ muny+tsA pa ya/

pra sha ma ya/ pra sha ma ya/ yud+d+hot+ta ri Na phaT/ tsit+ta ni ra ma la ka ri phaT/ a su ra nir+g+ha ta ni phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ra phaT/ sa ha sra shi ra se phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma skr-i

te phaT/ sarba sha trU~M nA sha ni phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/ pa ra tsakra ni ba ra Ni phaT/ pa ra sain+ya bi dra pa Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya/ karma sU da ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba gra hot+sA da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta bi

trA NA~M/ so bsta ya kA nA~M/ sa pa ri bA rA NA~M/ te dza sa~M ma ma sha rI raM/ sarba b+ha yo ba dra be b+h+yaH/ sarba yud+he b+h+ya/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hib+h+yaH/ sarba du skr-i te b+h+yaH/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka kho rde b+h+yaH/ sarba bi She b+h+yaH/ sarba kA ya bA ga tsit+ta bi rA d+he b+h+ya sh+tsa/ rak+Sha

rak+Sha mA~M swA hA/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/ yi ger bris pa dang / ston pa dang / bklags pa dang / bzung bas bdag dang gzhan srung ba'o/ /de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang / sbyin sreg

gis yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha

ma yin rnams las pham/ rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris las pham/ rab tu pham ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu pham na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par

bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung shig /ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan

las 'di mnos so/ /mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ /mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa'am/ tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo / /bcom

ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya bA hi ni/ shang ka ri shang ka ri/ pra b+haM ka ri/

bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sarba shatrU~M/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ dza ya bA hi ni/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ gra sa gra sa/ ha sa ha sa/ hU~M hU~M/ la hU~M la hU~M/ la m+bo da ri/ tri ne tre/

tsa tu ra bAk+t+re/ tsa tu da daMSh+Te/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra tri shU la/ badzra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /o~M b+ha ga ba ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma

tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ pa ra sai n+ya~M bi d+hAn+sa ya/ sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/ tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/ b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/ u lkA mu khi/ u lkA d+hA ra NI/ trai lo kya ma thA ni/

bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+ya na/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ka~M pa ka~M pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+Ta hA saM/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+yan/ bdag

gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/ sa t+ya bA di nA~M/ sa t+ye na/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ saM g+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ sat+ya bA

di nA~M/ sat+ya mA ti kra ma/ lam+bo da ri/ lam+bo da ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kuT+TA ba ya kuT+TA pa ya/ ru dra ma nA ya/ biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya prah+ma ma nA ya/ trai lo kya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba yak+Sha

rAk+Sha sa/ ga na d+harba/ ku~M b+haN+Da/ ma ho ra ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sai n+ya~M/ raM ga raM ga/ raM gA pa ya raM gA pa ya/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ puSh+pa mA li ni/ run+d+ha run+d+ha/ ri ti ri ti/ tsi ti tsi ti/ d+h+ri ti d+h+ri ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu kha pa ra/ se na

ku lot+sA da ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he he/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ri Ni ma ti/ dza~M b+ha d+h+wa dze/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ki te/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te swA hA/

gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sot+ta me swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/ tsan+d+ra arka bi ma le swA hA/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig

swA hA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa'am/ 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar

'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/ mgul du btags na mi'i rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung bar byed do/ /bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed/ dpal

skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde spa 'gong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun du gnas par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i

dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ka na ka ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / rig

sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags

dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang g.yul sbrad pa na rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir nga 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams

cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang

sngags dang / sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang /

kun du rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa ba

dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas/ kau shi ka khyod kyis sems

can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen mo rnam par rgyal ba chen mo zung shig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig

sngags chen mo gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+yA thA/ o~M hi ni hi ni/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ ni hi ni hi/ ni hi ra bi ni/ kAny+tsa nA pa ti/ lo kA mA te/ b+hu te/ b+hu ku ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te/ be de be de be ta man+t+ra

a d+hi kr-i te/ ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha shak+t+ri d+hA ra Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kA Da ma mA na si/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha

ya stam+b+ha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgyu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi'am ci'i sgyu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang /

rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang / drang srong gi sgyu dang / sems can dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang / sgyu thams cad/ ra la ra la/ radz+dza radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu

d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ba rA ba na/ tsakrA nan+ta/ grAn+tha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bid+yA/ sha trUNA~M/ stam+b+ha ya/ bA yuM stam+b+ha ya/ sUr+yAM stam+b+ha ya/ so maM stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru NAM stam+b+ha ya/ a g+niM stam+b+ha ya/ ud+da kaM d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA ra NI pA sha

ha ste/ peSh+Ta ya pA sha ne/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad/ ha na ha na/ da

ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs

shig phaT swA hA/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal pa 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de'i sde la pha rol gyi

dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so/ /lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/ mi'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang

gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag

tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed

du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs

kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na bdag gi lus bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / rig sngags thams

cad dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/ /rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag

tshogs gdul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/ /lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa

med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te bcang bar bya/ mgul du gdags par bya'o/ /yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang /

g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dge ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor na bcings pa dang rengs

par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na sgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pas zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na smra ba thams cad
kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams

par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/ /srad bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don thams

cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA la shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad

bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnod pa bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ /de las bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags don thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar

byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par byed pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang /

sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon

dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ mdangs 'phrog ma dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su spos za ba

dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung

las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba thams cad

rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zung shig /thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a De ma De pra ma De/ pra me di ri/ go la me/ po le bo se/ mod de/ bad de/ kha rad te/ kha

ra ne/ gra Na gra Ne/ gra Na pra ga Ne/ mo Ne/ pra ti mo Ni/ kA lI pra krA lI tsaN+Di/ ma hA caN+De pra ti tsaN+De/ be ge a ti ba ge/ so na/ go na/ mo hA/ pra mo hA/ mo ta pra mo TA/ nA shA ni/ pra nA shA ni/ d+ha ba nI/ pra d+ha ba nI/ ba la ga nI/

pra ba la ga nI/ nr-id t+ya nI/ pra nrid t+ya nI/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ ha na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Tan nA sha ya/ sarba a b+ha ya pra te/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang /

nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad grub par gyur cig /de lta bas na khi di khi di/ tsum b+he/ sarba satwa hi te ra te/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M swA hA/ lha'i dbang po thams cad la mi 'jigs

pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcings sam/ skra la mdud pa bor ram/ bzlas brjod byas sam/ yungs kar ram/ gi'u wang la lan cig sngags te bskus sam/ go cha la bsngags na mtshon
gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ rims nad kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig pas ma yin/ nyin gnyis pas ma yin/ nyin gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mes ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro

langs kyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub par byed do/ /sbyar

te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis mi tshugs par byed do/ /pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed do/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed do/ /bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed do/ /gdon thams cad phung bar byed do/ /gdon gang

gis mi gtong na yang de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa thams cad la rab tu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar

chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an+ta rA ya ki bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ril dbang po'i brag phug na

bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur te/ tshe'i 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang tshe don du gnyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang

dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba/ bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams

nyon cig /tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya pa ri shwa d+ha ne/ a b+ha ye/ a b+ha yaM da de/ ni ru ba kliSh+Ti/ a na ku le/ a ku la ba ri sho d+ha ne/ a gra te/ a bi kalpe/ a bi kalpa ne/ ats+yu te/ shu b+he shu b+he/

te dza ste dzo ba ti/ sha me u pa sha me/ ma ho pa sha me/ mai tri mai t+r+yud+d+hi te to She/ to Sha ya Ne sa t+ye/ sa t+ya dar+Shi/ a bi rud+d+he/ sa hi te/ si hi ta twe/ aR+the aR+tha sid+d+he/ a mr-i te/ a mr-i ta pa te/ ab+hI te/ badzra sat+ye/ ak+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ya pra b+he/ dran+t+ra ba re/ shud+d+he

shud+d+he/ pra b+he/ a ba b+hA se/ a ba b+hA sa ba ti/ u pa yo ge/ a nut+ta re/ sa ma tsit+te/ bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ shI le bi sho d+ha ne/ a saM har+ye/ su ni gr-i hI taM ma ra ba lA nAM/ pa ra dza yo dr-iSh+Ti ga trA NA~M/ dz+wa la naM d+harmo lkA yai/ ut+g+ha TA nAM/ d+harma ni d+ha na s+ya/

sa~M gra hA NAM/ d+harma ko Sha s+ya/ kau shi ka khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi ngag ni khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba

dag go/ /'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i

dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du/ kho bo lha las ma gyur la/ /'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/ /kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/ /grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /'di'i mthu thams

cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig /na mo a ke tu len ge tsaN+Da na ye swA hA/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ d+harmar+tha

sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ sarbA an+ta rA yi bi sho d+ha ni ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye

shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dwA mi DA bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smyig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun

dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig /kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs

na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs

rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi na d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag

la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA swa re/ aN+DA re/

paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka ra di/ ping+ga lA k+Shi dan+ti mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par

'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni/ re ri/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis

dr-I D+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris na de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad

las thar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang sman pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs

'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ prah+ma swA re swA re swA hA/ pra h+ma gar+b+ha puSh+pa sa~M sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lag par

'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni bar NI/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mA da na d+he/ ma ti ma ti/ ti Ti/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/

tsaN+Da li/ ma ta~M gi/ ba ra la ni/ hI na ma d+h+ya ma d+hA ra nI ma la ni/ da la mat+te/ tsakra pa kri/ sha pa ri sha pa ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las
rnam pa thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po
rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye

bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ ni ra mu k+te/ ma~M

ga li/ stu te/ ta bi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba/ dus ma lags par

'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga

la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum
pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi sdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung

ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad

du'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ar dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ puN+ya par+yA ba te/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ Ar+ya pu N+ya so pa kI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa'am/

bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las

byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig

rten skyong ba dang / klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin dag khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gzung ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang

sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/ /phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag

dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod

do/ /'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis
kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags

pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel

ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'ching ba gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o/ /las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ /'byung po kun gyis 'jigs pa med/ /bdud rtsi las ni

bdud rtsi 'byung / /'di ni las kun byed pa yin/ /dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang / /gzhan dang dgras ni 'khor ba dang / /rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang / /rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang / /

rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed/ /rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel/ /dug dang me ni dengs byed dang / /rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel/ /chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul/ /rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel/ /

'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang / /chos kun rab tu ston pa ste/ /'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms/ /gang tshe rig sngags 'di bshad
pa/ /de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur/ /'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/ /rig sngags rgyal po bla na med/ /'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste/ /'jig rten gsum po kun gyis mchod/ /de nas 'jigs

pa med par spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so/ /o~M ta ra ta ra/ tA

re tA re/ mo ri ke/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ sUr+ya kAn+te/ he ma pra b+he/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi Sha pra sha ma ni/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba

bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skri te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Shi ta/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ a nudz+nyA te/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/ pa ri pU re/ gaM gA na dI bA lu ko

pa ma/ ta thA ga ta/ b+hA Shi ta/ pri yaM ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ pri ti ka ri/ shu b+ha ka ri/ pa bi tra/ ma~M ga la d+hA ri Ni/ sarba de ba tA/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba kiM na ra a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ sarba

yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ prah+ma b+hA Shi te/ in+d+ra b+hA Shi te/ tsa tu ra ma hA rA dza b+hA Shi te/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya b+hA Shi te/ o~M ti ri ti ri/ tsan+d+ra kI ra Ne/ ki li ki li/ sarba sha trU~M bi nA sha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa

sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad

la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so/ /de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang

bsnyad do/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser

thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal

dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba/ srog skyong ba/ tshe sbyin pa/ lag cha rengs par byed pa/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/

dgra thams cad zlog pa/ 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /shud+d+he/ muk+te/ pra b+hA swa re/ shwe te/ paN+Da rA hA si ni/ sarba duSh+Ta na dzaM b+ha yA mi/ stam+b+ha yA mi/ mo ha

yA mi/ oM swA hA/ pa bi tre swA hA/ shwe te swA hA/ shwe te pa ta pa bit+t+re swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tA re/ tA ri Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarba ka li/ ka la ha/ bi gra ha/ bi byA d+hi/ duHsop+na b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ rtag tu le lo med

par ni/ /gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa/ /de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /dus kun du ni srung bar byed/ /de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/ /de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug /ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na/ /gzi brjid grags 'chang

lhan ne bzhin/ /de la gshed byed byad stems dang / /srul po dag gis mi tshugs te/ /de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur/ /kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan

gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun

nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs grub pa

rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lto 'phye chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi'am ci rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

srin po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig pa'i bdag po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po

che'i phreng ba'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba las thams cad byed pa gtsang ma brjod par bya ste/ dag cing de bzhin bkra shis pa/ /bsod nams byed gtsang dpal yon can/ /srin po 'joms

pa'i lha rnams dang / /sems can kun gyis mi thub pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'jig pa/ /don kun sgrub pa dpal yon can/ /gdon kun rnam par 'jig byed pa/ /rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa/ /brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di/ /

dug dang gshed byed 'jig byed pa/ /me dgra rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / /gshed byed gdon dang ro langs dang / /rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad/ /rtag

tu bdag la bsrung bar mdzod/ /nyin gcig pa yi rims nad dang / /nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum dang / /nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang / /mi bzad rims las 'di srung byed/ /dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang / /kha zas bzhin du 'ju bar

'gyur/ /gang gi mngal na mi chags dang / /gang gi bu pho 'chi ba yang / /rin po che yi phreng ba 'dis/ /de dag myur du 'tsho bar byed/ /nor 'dod pas ni nor rnams 'thob/ /dpal 'dod pa yang dpal 'thob 'gyur/ /'thab cing 'gyed dang

g.yul ngor yang / /myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /sems can rnams la gnong gzigs nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa/ /rin chen phreng zhes bya ba yi/ /rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha na ka ri/ bi pu la ka ri/

dza ya ka ri/ yaSh+Ti ka ri/ pri d+hi ka ri/ A yurda de/ puN+ya dA ri/ a la k+Sh+mA pra sha ma ni/ d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ bi brta ni/ shrI ka ri/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra pA sha brti ni/ me d+hA dza na ni/ pu tra dza na ni/ pa ri ba rA bar+d+ha ni/ A yurda de/ pri ti ka

ri/ dzaM b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha shak+ti/ kany+tsa na mA le/ gra ha sau mya ka ra Ni/ sarba ka li ka la ha/ bi gra bi byA d+ha/ pra sha ma ni/ pa ra cekra ni bA ra Ni/ pa ra sai n+ya/ stam+b+ha ni/ tsit+ta ni ra ma lI ka ra NI/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ni/

sarba kA la biSh+Ta nA sha ni swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ sarba de ba a nu dz+hi te swA hA/ sarba nA ga saM rak+Shi te swA hA/ o~M ni ri ni ri phaT/ ha na ha na phaT/ da ha da ha phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ gang dag bdag la

sdang bar sems pa dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byad byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT swA hA/ ag+hiM stam+b+ha yA mi be Shi shU trUM u da kaM tsau rA na/ sarba duSh+Ta na

sarba pra t+yar+thi ka/ pra t+ya man+t+ra/ staM b+ha yA mi/ dzaM b+ha yA mi/ mo ha yA mi/ phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba/ /rin chen phreng gis rnam par brgyan/ /las kun byed dang de bzhin du/ /rtag tu srung ba byed pa 'di/ /'gro ba'am

yang na ci yang rung / /de dag 'ga' zhig bris te 'chang / /srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog /sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab par yang / /kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dge/ /mi gang gtsang sbrar byas nas su/ /

rig sngags 'di bris 'chang ba dang / /bklags dran shes rab can de la/ /'jigs pa kun du mi 'byung ngo / /cho ga bzhin du klog 'chang na/ /gsang ba po kun rtag tu srung / /yongs su skyong bar byed par 'gyur/ /rtag

tu rgyal bar byed pa ste/ /dper na rin chen phreng ba yis/ /mgo bo brgyan na mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes/ /gang zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang na/ /de yi gdon rnams rnam par 'jig /nad kyis btab

par mi 'gyur ro/ /bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/ /de yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /

lha yi dbang po rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung / /de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad/ /dge ba dang ni nor rnams 'phel/ /sdig pa rnams kyang byad par 'gyur/ /rmi

lam ngan nyes byas pa yis/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni mu ni ri/ ma ti ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /sangs rgyas thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /
zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya bA hi ni/

dza yot+ta ri/ ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ tsa la tsa la/ k+ShiN k+ShiN/ sarba karma A ba ra NA ni me sarbA dz+nyA dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti sa ha sra brte/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki ti tsak+ShuHshro tra g+h+ra Na dzi hwA kA ya ma no bi dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ phu ru phu ru/

su ru su ru/ phu rA phu rA/ pra phu rA pra phu rA/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/ a b+hA ba swA hA/ sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi

sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas stong gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par

'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa phan yon tshad med pa dag 'byung ngo / /stong 'gyur
zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA Sh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA ra NI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs

rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi

thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+hA re d+hA ra NI/ rat+na ko Te/ a b+ha

ya kalbe/ kalbe ni/ ga Ne a nan+ta kalbe/ a mr-i ta kalbe/ hu tA sha re/ a nan+ta mu khe/ a nan+ta tsak+Shu sa mut+ga te/ o~M b+ha swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can

dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs

pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/ zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /
na maHsarba bid+yA/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs // @#/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M mu ni d+harme/ saM gra ha d+harme/ a nu gra ha d+harme/ bi mu k+tid+harme/ sA ra a nu gra ha d+harme/ bai shra ba Na pa ri brta

na d+harme/ sarba kAr+ya pa ri pra ma Na d+harme/ sa man+tA nu pa ri brta na d+ha rme swA hA/ o~M pradz+nye shru ti smr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/ d+hIHd+hA ra NI swA hA/ o~M pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ba la swA hA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar
'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@##/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M pradz+nyA pradz+nye/ pradz+nyA a pa b+hA se/ pradz+nyA ba lo ka ti sarba d+harma an+d+ha

kA ra bid+ha ma ni/ sid+d+he su sid+d+he/ sid+d+h+yan+tu mAM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba dz+nyA na san+d+ha ri/ b+ha ga ba ti bats+tshe la/ pra sa ra d+he ha sta ma ma su ka ra/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ kaM pa kaM pa/ pA la pA la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ gardza gardza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti mA bi
